column5: going  to BPS .. I have a rod that needs to be re-tipped .. does anyone know if they do it at the store while you wait?
Not sure,  What kind of rod is it?

well if your going there and you wouldnt mind doing a favor....  i am interested in the Berkley Glowstik M-H 9 ft rod, could u see if they carry them there instead of me going all the way over there and fighting traffic from Niagara.... thanks if you can, if not.. no biggie..  P.S - i do not know if they fix rods while you wait.. id imagine they do.. they do everything else there lol... Bud
I'd give them a call, they usually are pretty good about checking to see what is in stock.  Saves a long drive.
